directions: Heat oil in hot wok or large skillet over high heat. Add chicken, green onions and carrot. Stir-fry 3 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
Add egg; cook, stirring gently, until firm. Stir in rice and cook until heated through.
Add roasted garlic teriyaki sauce; remove pan from heat. Stir mixture until well mixed. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons Kikkoman Roasted Garlic Teriyaki Marinade & Sauce
title: Roasted Garlic Teriyaki Fried Rice with Chicken
